00058 namespace ST
00059 {
00060     int timeout = 0;
00061     bool connecting = false;
00062 
00063     void submit_connect(AG_Event *event)
00064     {
00065         std::string hostname;
00066         int port = 0;
00067         // get the pointers to the input boxes
00068         AG_Textbox *one = static_cast<AG_Textbox*>(AG_PTR(1));
00069         AG_Textbox *two = static_cast<AG_Textbox*>(AG_PTR(2));
00070 
00071         // check they are valid, then assign their values
00072         if (one && two)
00073         {
00074             hostname = AG_TextboxDupString(one);
00075             port = AG_TextboxInt(two);
00076         }
00077 
00078         // check the input isnt blank and not already connecting
00079         if (!connecting && !hostname.empty() && port != 0)
00080         {
00081             // set when timeout starts, connect to server
00082             timeout = SDL_GetTicks();
00083             networkManager->connect(hostname, port);
00084             connecting = true;
00085 
00086             // reset any error messages
00087                         interfaceManager->setErrorMessage("");
00088                         interfaceManager->showErrorWindow(false);
00089         }
00090         else
00091         {
00092             if (connecting)
00093             {
00094                 interfaceManager->setErrorMessage("Already connecting, please be patient.");
00095             }
00096 
00097             else if (hostname.empty())
00098             {
00099                 interfaceManager->setErrorMessage("Invalid hostname, please enter a server to connect to.");
00100             }
00101 
00102             else if (port == 0)
00103             {
00104                 interfaceManager->setErrorMessage("Invalid port number, please enter the port to connect to.");
00105             }
00106 
00107             interfaceManager->showErrorWindow(true);
00108         }
00109     }
00110 
00111         ConnectState::ConnectState()
00112         {
00113         }

00115         void ConnectState::enter()
00116         {
00117                 int screenWidth = graphicsEngine->getScreenWidth();
00118                 int screenHeight = graphicsEngine->getScreenHeight();
00119                 int halfScreenWidth = screenWidth / 2;
00120                 int halfScreenHeight = screenHeight / 2;
00121 
00122                 // create window for entering username and password
00123                 AG_Window *win = AG_WindowNew(AG_WINDOW_PLAIN|AG_WINDOW_KEEPBELOW);
00124                 AG_WindowShow(win);
00125                 AG_WindowMaximize(win);
00126 
00127                 AG_Window *test = AG_WindowNewNamed(AG_WINDOW_NOBUTTONS|AG_WINDOW_KEEPABOVE, "Connection");
00128                 AG_WindowSetCaption(test, "Connect to server");
00129                 AG_WindowSetSpacing(test, 12);
00130                 AG_WindowSetGeometry(test, halfScreenWidth - 125, halfScreenHeight - 45, 225, 135);
00131 
00132                 AG_Textbox *hostname = AG_TextboxNew(test, 0, "Server: ");
00133                 AG_Textbox *port = AG_TextboxNew(test, AG_TEXTBOX_INT_ONLY, "Port: ");
00134 
00135                 // set defaults
00136                 AG_TextboxSetString(hostname, "server.casualgamer.co.uk");
00137                 AG_TextboxSetString(port, "9910");
00138 
00139                 AG_Button *button = AG_ButtonNewFn(test, 0, "Submit", submit_connect, "%p%p", hostname, port);
00140                 AG_ButtonJustify(button, AG_TEXT_CENTER);
00141                 AG_WidgetFocus(button);
00142 
00143                 AG_WindowHide(test);
00144 
00145                 interfaceManager->addWindow(win);
00146                 interfaceManager->addWindow(test);
00147 
00148                 timeout = SDL_GetTicks();
00149         networkManager->connect();
00150         connecting = true;
00151     }
00152 
00153         void ConnectState::exit()
00154         {
00155                 interfaceManager->removeAllWindows();
00156         }
00157 
00158         bool ConnectState::update()
00159         {
00160         // Check for input, if escape pressed, exit
00161                 if (inputManager->getKey(SDLK_ESCAPE))
00162                 {
00163                         return false;
00164                 }
00165 
00166         // when connected, send the version
00167                 if (networkManager->isConnected() && connecting)
00168                 {
00169                     connecting = false;
00170                     networkManager->sendVersion();
00171                 }
00172 
00173         // check if its timedout
00174                 if (timeout && (SDL_GetTicks() - timeout > 5000))
00175                 {
00176                     connecting = false;
00177                     networkManager->disconnect();
00178 
00179                     // reset timeout, and log the error
00180                     timeout = 0;
00181                     logger->logWarning("Connecting timed out");
00182                     interfaceManager->showWindow("/Connection", true);
00183 
00184                         // set error label, and stop connecting
00185                     interfaceManager->setErrorMessage("Error: Connection timed out");
00186                     interfaceManager->showErrorWindow(true);
00187                 }
00188 
00189                 SDL_Delay(0);
00190 
00191                 return true;
00192         }
00193 
00194 }
